scripts.build:shared: pushd packages/shared && npm run build && popd
scripts.build:form: pushd packages/create-request-form && npm run build && popd
scripts.build:dashboard: pushd packages/invoice-dashboard && npm run build && popd
scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:form && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.link:all: for d in packages/*; do pushd $d; npm link; popd; done
scripts.unlink:all: for d in packages/*; do pushd $d; npm unlink; popd; done
